Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Arizona in 2009...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/7/2012, off Neftali Feliz (FLA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/28/2012, off Kyle McClellan (PIT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/2012, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles (N) on 7/12/2013...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Florida on 8/12/2013...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Washington on 8/2/2014...
Traded from Arizona to Los Angeles (A) on 3/2/2017 (Going to ARI: LF T. Colvin. Going to LAA: 2B D. Ackley)...
Had 6 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/19/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2017...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (N) on 7/18/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/23/2018, hitting .393 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 8/3/2018 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/22/2019, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 7/9/2020...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 4/11/2022...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/5/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/7/2022, hitting .520 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2022...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/17/2023, off Christopher Green (NYA)...
